/usr/local/cuda-11.4/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/cuda_openmp_prj.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cuda_openmp_prj.dir/myutil.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/cuda_openmp_prj.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
